title: Arya Bhavan
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Indian, Organic, Raw, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: Indian food restaurant, became all-vegan in summer 2013. Has sugar-free vegan desserts and drinks and sometimes raw vegan cheesecake; uses organic tofu sweeteners, agave syrup, and coconut sweetener. Weekdays is a la carte menu. Raw food night on Monday. Vegan buffet on Friday nights and all day Saturday & Sunday.
